name: absolutepitch
0:
”Alexa, load Absolute Pitch”
”Alexa, ask Absolute Pitch to quiz me”
”Alexa, ask Absolute Pitch to make harder”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: absolute pitch
des: Absolute Pitch can help you learn to identify notes. Match a tone to one of two notes played. (Level two difficulty)- At Level three you must choose from three notes played. When you have been able to score 10 of 10, Try final quiz. At this level notes will be played, but not identified. You must identify the note with no hints (note names). Good Luck and good learning.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
